revised_title: Isolation and Properties of a Crystalline Fatty Acid from Human Urine
tldr: The author describes a process to isolate a crystalline fatty acid from human urine and discusses its properties. The fatty acid is found to be white, crystalline, and has a melting point of 54°C. It is insoluble in water but soluble in alcohol and ether. The author speculates that it may be a mixture of stearic and palmitic acid.
